history.content:
The optional statement is for appeals as far as I know. You will appeal after they look at your application, at which point you submit your personal statement. I am talking from personal experience.

The statement section in last semester's application is actually redundant, which is probably why they removed it.

The optional statement is for appeals afaik. You will appeal after they look at your application, at which point you submit your personal statement. I am talking from personal experience.

The statement section in last semester's application is actually redundant, which is probably why they removed it.

I saw that there is no more optional statement on the cs application; however, I submitted an application this previous semester and my application was not looked at because of an Incomplete grade! If I resubmit after I get a grade will my previous application be looked at as well?
history.subject: CS Declaration Statement
